Title: Nyamen
Description: ['CGI ramen bowls that look like cats but have the personalities of high school girls talk about every day life things that involve ramen. The opening and ending sequence features them as 2D anime cat-girls with naruto accessories even though they are not represented as such in the actual show.']
Related: ['Parent story: Nyani ga Nyandaa Nyandaa Kamen', 'Alternative version: Nyani ga Nyandaa Nyandaa Kamen no Koutsuu Anzen']
Voices: ['Aiuchi, Sae', 'Nabatame, Hitomi', 'Mori, Chisato', 'Nomura, Mayuka', 'Matsuzaki, Rei', 'Kobayashi, Miharu', 'Furuki, Nozomi']
Staff: [['Tamura, Manabu', 'Producer'], ['Ueno, Hiroyuki', 'Producer'], ['Kitagawa, Katsutoshi', 'Theme Song Lyrics, Theme Song Arrangement, Theme Song Composition, Music']]
